book.title: Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2 Master Data Services

reviews.review: If you're looking for an excellent book on the new Master Data Services component of SQL Server 2008 R2, definitely check this one out! To be released in June 2011 by Packt Publishing!

Like fantasy? What are you waiting for then? It's a classic!
If you liked the movie, you'll love the book.
